title: World Liberty burns 47M tokens in bid to pump price as slide continues
summary: World Liberty Financial is combatting a price drop in its cryptocurrency by burning tokens. This strategy aims to stabilize the value of the crypto, which has b

body.raw:
![ World Liberty burns 47M tokens in bid to pump price as slide continues ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDEvMDE5NDk3N2EtYjMyZi03MmY3LTk1YzEtMzA0NGEwNDBlZmM5.jpg)

World Liberty Financial is combatting a price drop in its cryptocurrency by burning tokens. This strategy aims to stabilize the value of the crypto, which has been fluctuating since its public trading debut on Monday.

---

**Original Article:** [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/wlfi-token-burn-price-drop-world-liberty-financial?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound)

*This article was originally published on [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/wlfi-token-burn-price-drop-world-liberty-financial?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound) and has been curated for our readers.*
